block.field: "The random capture point is located at: " + location

block.comment: Give the player a damaged Elytra

block.field: "Random capture point is located at: " + textLocation

block.comment: You'll turn into a spectator once your bed has been destroyed and you die.
Set gameId so we know that null is not associated with any player
Join server sets gameId to 0 so this should never occur, since player's gameId is set to zero when they join the server.

block.field: "Your bed has been destroyed, You are now a spectator"
"Capture point has been captured by " + team + " team"
"The game is over " + team + " has won"
"Sorry you are not wearing the elytra"
"Sorry, arrows or snowballs need to be in your offhand to launch "
"Sorry you cannot fly, your elytra is damaged. You are now infantry, place a weapon in your off-hand to shoot firework"
"The random capture point is located at: [" + location.x + "," + location.y + "," + location.z + "]"
